comment: Lexicographical order is a well-ordering of ` On X. On ` . Proposition 7.56(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 54. Note that unlike ~ r0weon , this order is _not_ set-like, as the preimage of ` <. 1o , (/) >. ` is the proper class ` ( { (/) } X. On ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)
